Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawrence, Cicero, Elston, Foster, Mailwaukee, & into Jefferson Park Terminal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawrence, Cicero, Elston, Foster, Mailwaukee, and into Jefferson Park Terminal, due to street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute at Ashland/Fulton
ShortDescription: Southbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Grand, Ogden, Carroll and Ashland, due to street blockage near Ashland/Fulton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
